mapper.select: select a.is_private isPrivate,a.uid, a.c_status cStatus from tab_content_info a where a.cid=#{cid} and not EXISTS (select 1 from tab_editor_contentrecommend b where a.cid=b.cid and b.type=#{type} )
mapper.update: update tab_content_info set like_falsenum=like_falsenum-#{num} where cid=#{cid}
mapper.select: select a.uid from tab_user_info a where a.role_id=4 and not EXISTS (select 1 from tab_user_likecontent b where b.cid=#{cid} and a.uid=b.uid)
select uid from tab_editor_userrecommend where uid=#{uid} and type=#{type}
